channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Signage required, 27th May
item.description:
Horses and riders use this junction on a regular basis. Currently there is no signage warning of horse riders despite several nasty horse accidents here over the past few years. I had hoped that with all the highways improvements and constant roadworks here that Gloucestershire Highways would have considered properly the use of horse riders.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Corner House A4019, Coombe Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole "filling in", 27th May
item.description:
Abysmal filling in of the pothole. Also, many potholes aren't filled in at all.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Workshop Fieldview Bungalow A38, The Leigh
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road disintegrated, 27th May
item.description:
Whole road surface has broken up near junction

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit V1 Kingsville Road, Kingsditch Trading Estate
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely overgrown pavement - almost impassable, 27th May
item.description:
The footpath between Stanboro Lane and Knightsbridge Lodge is extremely overgrown in parts (grass and weeds are now above my waist and almost head height in parts) and the reservation in the Stanboro area has very long grass obstructing viewing when pulling out of the junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Stanboro Cottage A4019, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken paving slabs, 27th May
item.description:
The paving slabs outside 22 Welland Drive are broken and are at different dangerous levels.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Welland Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Eggy smell rushing water, 26th May
item.description:
I noticed a loud sound of rushing water under the manhole covers, there is also an eggy/drainy smell along Quat Goose Lane towards The Firs
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Willow Lodge Brockhampton Lane, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tipped barbecue, 26th May
item.description:
See photo. Large metal barbecue type thing in grass by pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Roundhouse, 19 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working again, 26th May
item.description:
Street light not working again reported back in Nov last year, I think it was fixed and working for a few weeks by Wimpey homes dev. But not been working for weeks now
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Washpool Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 25th May
item.description:
Pothole just where it could throw a motorcyclist or cyclist off their cycle. It has been there for many months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 54 Kayte Lane, Bishops Cleeve

item.title: Flytipping, 25th May

Flytipping of garden furniture

item.title: Damaged tree, 24th May
item.description:
This tree is located in Bath Terrace car park and may well not survive if it is not protected in some way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Commercial Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Overgrown footpaths and central reservation, 24th May
item.description:
The footpath between Stanboro Lane and Knightsbridge Lodge is extremely overgrown in parts (grass and weeds higher than knees) and the reservation in the Stanboro area has very long grass obstructing viewing when pulling out of the junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Elmstone Hardwicke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped Plastic item and mat, 24th May
item.description:
The location is the Entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. There is rubbish in front of the entrance wall. Please can it be cleared up as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gutters need cleaning, 24th May
item.description:
Gutters are filled with soil, weeds and debris, preventing effective use of drains and are an eyesore. Pavements need clearing of weeds.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 122 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking illegally, 23rd May
item.description:
This car parks here every day on double yellow lines on the edge of junction causing issues entering marsh lane. Never seen a parking ticket on

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Marsh Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking illegally, 23rd May
item.description:
Cars parked here everyday on double yellow lines both sides of road spoke to traffic wardens that where on other side of road apparently not on the route

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Marsh Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous parking, 23rd May
item.description:
An accident blackspot here, vehicle owners continue to illegally park along this spot despite the double yellow lines and narrow pavements.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36a Church Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not finalised road by the developer, 23rd May
item.description:
This road was left unfinshed by the developer and I am wondering if you can escalate the situation for us. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Sapphire Way, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes / disintegrating road surface, 23rd May
item.description:
Glencairn Court. A number of potholes have recently been repaired, but many more remain having been ignored during the recent works.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More fly tipping, 22nd May
item.description:
Seems to be a common issue in the area.
